articles.title: Marilyn Monroe biopic star Ana De Armas slams NC-17 rating from Netflix - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress said that she was 'baffled' by the NC-17 rating for the show, adding that there are a 'number of shows or movies' that are 'way more explicit with a lot more sexual content. '
articles.content:
